DOC.brief_summary: This pilot clinical trial study light-scattering spectroscopy find disease patient stage II-III breast cancer . Diagnostic procedure , light-scattering spectroscopy , may help find diagnose breast cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To evaluate whether light-scattering spectroscopy reliably distinguish two subject group : clinical stage II stage III breast cancer without breast cancer . OUTLINE : Patients undergo light-scattering spectroscopy breast addition standard care relate screen breast cancer treatment breast cancer .
DOC.criteria: Participants breast cancer free ( mammogram `` negative '' within 1 month test ) absence clinical suspicion breast cancer physical exam clinical stage II stage III breast cancer .
